summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Fractal-only TypeScript backend module with React frontend. All required endpoints are working correctly and frontend UI is fully functional.
passed_tests: GET /api/health returns ok: true, mode: FRACTAL_ONLY
GET /api/fractal/health returns ok: true, enabled: true
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/signal?symbol=BTC returns assembled signal with all horizons (7d, 14d, 30d)
Main page (/) displays correctly with 'Open Fractal Dashboard' button
/fractal page loads and displays Fractal V2.1 dashboard
Admin controls (drift inject, reset) are present and functional
No error messages displayed on UI
